clause: Help Sign in Privacy Policy Effective: June 7, 2024.
label: none

clause: This Privacy Policy explains how Grubhub Holdings Inc.
label: none

clause: and its subsidiaries and affiliates (“Grubhub”, “we”, “us” or “our”) collect, use, disclose, and otherwise process personal information in connection with our Platform and Services.
label: none

clause: Our Platform includes: (i) our websites, including related subdomains, (ii) our mobile, tablet, and other smart device applications, (iii) application program interfaces, (iv) in-store kiosks and other online services, and (v) any other tools, technology, and programs now or in the future; in each case, that reference this Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: “Services” includes all services associated with the Platform.
label: none

clause: This Privacy Policy does not cover or address: the privacy practices of Merchants available on our Platform, including their authorized licensees and franchisees; branded channel services provided to Merchants, including those provided by our affiliate SCVNGR, Inc.
label: none

clause: d/b/a LevelUp (“LevelUp”) (where the data processing is performed on behalf of the Merchants); or our privacy practices relating to the personal information of job applicants, employees, Delivery Partners, and other personnel.
label: none

clause: For the LevelUp privacy policy, go here, and for the Delivery Partner privacy policy, go here.
label: none

clause: If you see any undefined term in this Privacy Policy, it has the definition specified in our Terms of Use.
label: none

clause: By accessing or using the Platform and/or Services, you agree that you have read, understood, and agree to our collection, storage, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Use.
label: none

clause: How We Collect, Use, and Share Your Personal Information 1.1.
label: none

clause: Identifiers When you create an Account, complete your Account profile, place an order, sign up for a mailing list, or otherwise communicate or interact with us (whether or not through an Account), we collect identifiers such as your name, address, phone number, and email address.
label: none

clause: We may also collect identifiers like your name or email address from other people or businesses.
label: none

clause: For example, we may receive identifiers (i) from a social network or authentication service, such as Facebook, Amazon, Apple, or Google, if you use those services to login to the Platform; (ii) from other Grubhub users who refer you to our Services or use our group order future; or (iii) from organizations you are part of, such as your employer or university, that use our enterprise services.
label: none

clause: Identifiers can also include numbers assigned to you like your IP address or a unique Grubhub account number and information about your device and its software like your browser type, device type/model/manufacturer, operating system, and other similar information.
label: none

clause: These identifiers are collected or created automatically when you use the Platform.
label: none

clause: We may use this information to: (i) create and manage your Account; (ii) facilitate order and delivery services; (iii) communicate with you directly about the Services, including your orders, as well as answer any questions, issues, or concerns you or other users may have; (iv) analyze use of and improve the Platform and our Services; (v) detect and prevent fraud, abuse, or other harmful activities, conduct security investigations and risk assessments, and improve and enforce our security measures; and (vi) send you marketing communications.
label: none

clause: We may share this information with ad networks and other advertising partners for the purpose of cross-context behavioral advertising.
label: none

clause: We may also share this information with other trusted partners, including those that enable you to access offers or promotions by linking or connecting your Grubhub account with account(s) you may hold with the partners.
label: none

clause: These trusted partners may use this information to support and market partnership benefits (including by communicating with you), as well as for their internal business purposes such as analytics and product improvement.
label: none

clause: Any such partner uses will be governed by the partners’ respective privacy policies.
label: none

clause: For campus users only, we may provide identifiers to select food service providers that operate restaurants and other food ordering and delivery services on your campus so that they can communicate directly with you and send you personalized communications and marketing.
label: none

clause: Please see Section 2.1 below for additional information about your choices.
label: none

clause: We may also disclose identifiers to our service providers, or for other lawful purposes, as described in greater detail in Section 1.11 below.
label: none

clause: Grubhub retains identifiers for as long as you have an account with Grubhub, and for such additional period as Grubhub determines is necessary to comply with its legal obligations and defend against legal claims.
label: none

clause: We collect payment information from you, such as credit or debit card details, when you place an order or update your saved payment methods.
label: none

clause: We use this information to: (i) fulfill your requests and process payments (e.g., to allow you to order food from Merchants and have it delivered to you); and (ii) detect or prevent fraud, abuse, or other harmful activities.
label: none

clause: We do not sell payment information to third parties or share it with third parties for cross-context behavioral advertising.
label: none

clause: We also do not share this information with third parties for business or commercial purposes, though we may disclose it to our service providers, or for other lawful purposes, as described in greater detail in Section 1.11 below.
label: none

clause: Grubhub retains payment information for as long as you have an account with Grubhub, and for such additional period as Grubhub determines is necessary to comply with its legal obligations and defend against legal claims.
label: none

clause: Whenever you make purchases on the Platform, we collect commercial information about you, such as your ordering history, purchasing tendencies, and rewards program progress.
label: none

clause: This information may be used to (i) facilitate order and delivery services; (ii) analyze use of and improve the Platform and our Services; (iii) detect and prevent fraud, abuse, or other harmful activities, conduct security investigations and risk assessments, and improve and enforce our security measures; (iv) personalize your Grubhub experience, including which Merchants and items we recommend to you and any ads you may see from us; and (v) manage your rewards program progress.
label: none

label: none

clause: Depending on your device and/or browser settings, this information can include the site from which you came to our site, the site to which you are going when you leave our site, the pages you visit on the Platform, the links you click on the Platform, whether you open our emails or click the links we send, whether you access the Platform from multiple devices, page scrolling, and where you click or move your mouse on our website.
label: none

clause: We use this information to (i) analyze use of and improve the Platform and our Services; (ii) detect and prevent fraud, abuse, or other harmful activities, conduct security investigations and risk assessments, and improve and enforce our security measures; (iii) personalize your Grubhub experience, including which Merchants and items we recommend to you and any ads you may see from us; (iv) evaluate the success of our advertising and marketing campaigns; and (v) send you marketing communications.
label: none

clause: We may collect internet usage information through a variety of tracking technologies, including cookies, web beacons (also known as pixels), embedded scripts, mobile SDKs, location-identifying technologies, and similar technology (collectively, “tracking technologies”), and we may use third-party partners or service providers to assist with this effort, such as Google and Meta (e.g., via the Meta Pixel).
label: data_sharing

clause: Information we collect automatically about you or your device may be combined with other personal information we collect directly, and our third-party partners may combine this information with information collected from other devices, websites, or apps.

clause: We may use the Google Maps API to gather geolocation data.

clause: Google uses various technologies to determine your location, including IP address, GPS and other sensors that may, for example, provide Google with information on nearby devices, WiFi access points and cell towers (see the Google privacy policy and the Google Maps terms of service to learn more).

clause: Other Circumstances Under Which We Might Use or Disclose Your Data.
label: none

clause: In addition to the above, Grubhub may need to use or disclose your personal information for: (i) providing our Services, including by providing information to Merchants, delivery providers, payment processors, and other service providers that we rely on to process and fulfill orders or other service providers that help us keep the Platform and our Services running smoothly; (ii) completing your requests, including by providing information to other Grubhub users when you use our group order feature or to Merchants who you direct us to provide information to; (iii) allowing you to use our enterprise services, including by providing information to your university or employer so that you can use its enterprise account; (iv) enabling your participation in Merchant reward programs, including by providing your information to Merchants as needed to track points and otherwise facilitate your participation in the reward program; (v) complying with legal and regulatory requirements and proceedings, including corporate reporting obligations, subpoenas, or law enforcement requests; and/or (vi) enforcing our rights, including to (a) investigate, prevent, and/or mitigate violations of our Terms of Use, (b) detect, suppress, or prevent fraud or reduce credit risk and collect debts owed to us, (c) exercise or protect the rights, property, or personal safety of Grubhub, our visitors, or others, and/or (d) enforce our agreements with third parties and business partners.
label: tracking

clause: In some cases when we disclose your information to third parties, those third parties will use and process your payment information in accordance with their own separate privacy policies and/or procedures.
label: none

clause: For example, we use a company called Braintree to process payments.
label: none

clause: Braintree’s privacy policy is available here.
label: none

clause: We may also disclose your personal information to: (i) other companies owned or controlled by Grubhub Holdings Inc., and other companies owned by or under common ownership as Grubhub Holdings Inc., which also includes our subsidiaries (i.e., any organization we own or control) or our ultimate holding company (i.e., any organization that owns or controls us) and any subsidiaries it owns, for operational or business purposes or as otherwise described in this Privacy Policy; or (ii) a third party during negotiation of, in connection with, or as an asset in a corporate business transaction, such as a merger, acquisition, joint venture, or financing or sale of all or a portion of company assets, or in the event of insolvency, bankruptcy, or receivership.
label: data_sharing

clause: Finally, we may use or disclose personal information for a specific purpose not contemplated by this Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: In such an event, we will specifically disclose that use to you and, when necessary, obtain your consent.
label: none

clause: Control Over Your Personal Information 2.1.
label: none

clause: Opting Out of Cross-Context Behavioral Advertising or “Sales” of your Information.
label: none

clause: states, you may have the right to opt out of our processing or sharing of your information for online cross-context behavioral advertising purposes.
label: none

clause: Note that certain state laws also allow you to opt out of the “sale” of your information to third parties in exchange for valuable consideration.
label: none

clause: While we do not sell your information in exchange for money, some of the ways described in Section 1 in which we may disclose your information to third parties or use analytics or online advertising tools that result in the disclosure of your information to third parties may be subject to this opt out right.
label: none

clause: This includes providing third party online advertising and analytics partners, as well as certain trusted partners with whom we link your accounts, with identifiers, internet usage information, and commercial information (e.g., records of transactions and purchases) in order to personalize ads for our Services, measure ad campaigns and conduct analytics, and improve and market partnership benefits.
label: data_sharing

clause: If you would like to opt out of sharing your personal information for cross-context behavioral advertising or out of “selling” your information, you may submit a request below: For Grubhub, click Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information.
label: none

clause: For Seamless, click Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information.
label: none

clause: You do not need to create an account with us to opt out, but we may ask you to provide additional personal information so that we can properly identify you to comply with your opt out request.
label: none

clause: We will only request personal information that is necessary to complete your request and use personal information provided in an opt out request to review and comply with the request.
label: none

clause: If you choose not to provide this information, we may only be able to process your request to the extent we are able to identify you in our data systems, including only processing your request on the device from which you submitted the request.
label: none

clause: Some devices and browsers may have settings for limiting how website and app operators like Grubhub can sell your information or use it for cross-context behavioral advertising.
label: none

clause: While we do not respond to “Do Not Track” signals from your browser at this time, if we detect that you have enabled a legally-recognized browser-based opt out preference signal for your device or browser (such as Global Privacy Control), we will endeavor to recognize such preference in accordance with and to the extent required by applicable law in required locations.
label: tracking

clause: If you are using an Apple iOS device, you may request that the Grubhub app not “track” you, in which case we will not collect your device’s IDFA or use information you provide through the app for cross-context behavioral advertising.
label: tracking

clause: Please note that even if you ask not to be tracked on an Apple iOS device, you should still click on one of the links above if you want to opt out of “selling” your data or of cross-context behavioral advertising through your browser.
label: tracking

clause: Controlling Cookies and Similar Tracking Technologies.
label: tracking

clause: You can use the methods described below to make certain choices regarding the use of cookies, pixels, and other similar tracking technologies.
label: tracking

clause: Please note that if you replace, change, or upgrade your browser or device, or delete your cookies, you may need to repeat these steps again.
label: tracking

clause: Disabling or removing cookies may negatively impact your experience using our Services, as some features may not work properly.
label: tracking

clause: Depending on your device and operating system, you may not be able to delete or block all cookies, you may not be able to block non-cookie technologies, or the changes to your settings may have no effect.
label: tracking

clause: (i) Browser Controls You may be able to disable and manage some cookies through your browser settings.
label: tracking

clause: Many web browsers will allow you to: (i) be notified when your device is about to receive a cookie and choose whether or not to accept it; (ii) disable existing cookies; or (iii) automatically reject all future cookies.
label: tracking

clause: If you use multiple browsers on the same device or if you use multiple devices, you will likely need to manage your settings for each browser or device individually.
label: none

clause: (ii) Analytics To disable analytics cookies you can use the browser controls discussed above or, for some of our providers, you can use their individual opt-out mechanisms.
label: tracking

clause: For example, you can use the Google Analytics Opt-Out Browser Add-on available here to prevent your browser from sharing data with Google Analytics.
label: none

clause: (iii) Interest Based Advertising We allow certain third-party partners (e.g., third-party online advertising networks and other third-party services) to place tracking technologies on our Platform, and we participate in interest-based advertising.
label: data_sharing

clause: To learn about interest-based advertising and how you may be able to opt-out of some of this advertising, including certain browser-based cross-device tracking for advertising purposes, visit the Network Advertising Initiative’s (NAI) website and/or the Digital Advertising Alliance’s (DAA) website.
label: tracking

clause: You can also customize settings regarding Google network ads by visiting Google’s Ad Center.
label: none

clause: For more information about the Meta Pixel, please see Meta’s Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: Finally, you may also be able to limit certain interest-based advertising on your mobile device through your device’s settings, including the “tracking” settings on iOS or by selecting “opt-out of interest based ads” on Android or by downloading the AppChoices app.
label: tracking

clause: After you use the opt out tools listed above, you will still see advertisements, but they may not be as relevant to you.
label: none

clause: Any links to third-party websites or instructions on how you might use third-party tools to control your online experience are provided for your convenience only; we do not control the content or features that may be available on these third-party services.
label: data_sharing

clause: We encourage you to review the full terms and features of those tools to determine how they work and what ads they limit or restrict.
label: none

clause: Push Notifications and our Access to Your Device Information.
label: none

clause: You may control our access to your device information or opt out of push notifications through the “Settings” app on your device.
label: none

clause: For instance, you can withdraw permission for the app to access your location data through your device settings, though we may continue to approximate your location based on your IP address or through other means.
label: location

clause: You can stop receiving promotional email communications by clicking on the “unsubscribe link” provided in such communications.
label: none

clause: You may not opt out of service-related communications (e.g., account verification, transactional communications, changes/updates to features of the services, technical and security notices).
label: none

clause: You may also unsubscribe from receiving certain order-related text (SMS) or multimedia (MMS) messages by replying "STOP" to the number sending the message.
label: none

clause: Please see our Terms of Use for more information on communications from or on behalf of Grubhub.
label: none

clause: Additional Rights Regarding Your Personal Information.
label: none

clause: Depending on your jurisdiction, including California and Colorado, you may have the right to request certain actions with respect to your data.
label: none

clause: We will endeavor to honor your requests regardless of the state where you live, where possible and consistent with law, but are not under an obligation to do so.
label: none

clause: You may submit a request to get a copy of your Personal Information, to understand what we collect and how we disclose your Personal Information, or to delete your Personal Information.
label: none

clause: We will need to verify your identity before processing your request, which may require us to request additional personal information from you or require you to log into your account.
label: none

clause: In certain circumstances, we may decline such a request, such as when we are unable to verify your identity, or when we are unable to delete your information for legal or regulatory reasons.
label: none

clause: If we are unable to comply with all or a portion of your request, we will explain the reasons for declining to comply with the request.
label: none

clause: You may submit a request through the following links: For Grubhub, click here.
label: none

clause: Alternatively, you may email us at privacy@grubhub.com with the subject line “Privacy Request.” You may also correct or update your personal information, such as your name, email address, address, payment information, and phone number, in your account profile page.
label: none

clause: If you choose to use any of these methods to manage your data, we will not penalize you, charge you different prices, or provide different quality of services, except to the extent you limit our ability to process personal information needed to provide our Services.
label: none

clause: For example, if you have your data deleted, we may no longer be able to provide you with our products and Services or engage with you in the same manner.
label: none

clause: If you have any questions about your request, you may email us at privacy@grubhub.com.
label: none

clause: Colorado, Connecticut, and Virginia residents may also have the right to appeal the denial of a request made by emailing privacy@grubhub.com, and we will respond within the legally required time period, including a written explanation of the results of your appeal.
label: none

clause: In certain circumstances, you may permit someone else (an “authorized agent”) to submit requests about your information on your behalf.
label: none

clause: The authorized agent must provide sufficient evidence to show that the authorized agent has authority to act on your behalf, including, without limitation, proof that the authorized agent has been lawfully vested with power of attorney.
label: none

clause: We may deny a request in the event we are not able to verify the authorized agent’s authority to act on your behalf.
label: none

clause: Please note that for privacy and security reasons, we may direct communications in response to an authorized agent’s request to you rather than to the authorized agent.
label: none

clause: For example, we may need to verify your identity and confirm directly with you that you have provided the authorized agent permission to submit the request, and it may take additional time to fulfill requests from authorized agents.
label: none

clause: How We Store and Protect Your Information 3.1.
label: none

clause: If you create an Account on the Platform as a visitor from outside the United States, by using and/or accessing the Platform or Services, you consent to the collection, transfer, storage, and processing of your information to and in the United States.
label: none

clause: If you are located in the European Union or other regions with laws governing data collection and use that may differ from U.S.
label: none

clause: law, please note that we may transfer information, including personal information, to a country and jurisdiction that does not have the same data protection laws as your jurisdiction.
label: none

clause: Grubhub employs physical, administrative, and technological safeguards designed to preserve the integrity and security of all information collected through our Platform and Services.
label: none

clause: However, no security system is impenetrable and we cannot guarantee the security of our systems.
label: none

clause: Please recognize that protecting your personal information is also your responsibility.
label: none

clause: Accordingly, we strongly recommend that you change your passwords often and not reuse passwords, use a combination of letters and numbers, make sure you use a secure browser, and otherwise take precautions when communicating your personal information on the internet.
label: none

clause: If you know or have reason to believe that your Account credentials have been lost, stolen, misappropriated, or otherwise compromised or in case of any actual or suspected unauthorized use of your Account, please contact us following the instructions in the Contact Us section below.
label: none

label: none

clause: In the event that we learn that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under age 16, we will endeavor to delete that information.
label: none

clause: If you have knowledge that we have collected personal information from a child under 16, please contact us at privacy@grubhub.com.
label: none

label: data_sharing

label: none

label: data_sharing

label: none

label: none

clause: Under California’s 'Shine the Light' law (Civ.
label: none

clause: Code § 1798.83), California residents that have an established business relationship with us have the right to request and obtain from us once a year, free of charge, a list of the third parties to whom we have disclosed their personal information (if any) for such third party's direct marketing purposes in the prior calendar year, as well as the type of personal information disclosed to those third parties.
label: data_sharing

clause: If you are a California resident and would like a copy of this notice, please submit a written request to the following address: Grubhub Holdings Inc., Attention: Privacy Team, 5 Bryant Park, 15th Floor, New York, NY 10018.
label: none

clause: In your request, please specify that you want a “Grubhub California Shine the Light Notice.” Please allow at least 30 days for a response.
label: none

clause: To opt-out of having your personal information disclosed to third parties for their direct marketing purposes, please click the Do Not Sell My Info link above.
label: none

clause: Pursuant to Washington state’s My Health, My Data Act (“MHMDA”), we are providing the following disclosures to consumers in Washington state: (i) Certain Merchants on our Platform sell healthcare-related items such as over-the-counter medications, first aid products, and other goods.
label: none

clause: We collect a record of your purchases of such items to facilitate such purchase and for the other uses stated below.
label: none

clause: Depending on the nature of your purchases, these records may include information that could be considered one or more of the following categories of “consumer health data” under the MHMDA: (i) information about health conditions, treatment, diseases, or diagnosis (e.g., treatment for allergies if you buy anti-histamine) and (ii) reproductive or sexual health information (e.g., pregnancy test or over-the-counter contraception).
label: none

clause: (ii) We collect the above directly from you when you place an order.
label: none

clause: When you place orders for such items, we may use records of the items you purchased to (i) facilitate order and delivery services; (ii) provide customer support services to you in connection with your order; (iii) detect and prevent fraud, abuse, or other harmful activities, such as security incidents; (iv) preserve the integrity and security of our systems; and (v) for other legal purposes, such as to comply with laws or to establish, exercise, or defend our legal rights.
label: none

clause: We may disclose records of the items you purchased (i) to Merchants, delivery providers, payment processors, and other service providers in order to provide the Services to you; (ii) in order to comply with our legal and regulatory requirements, including corporate reporting obligations with our affiliates, subpoenas, and law enforcement requests; (iii) to enforce our rights, including to (a) investigate, prevent, and/or mitigate violations of our Terms of Use, (b) detect, suppress, or prevent fraud or reduce credit risk and collect debts owed to us, (c) exercise or protect the rights, property, or personal safety of Grubhub, our visitors, or others, and/or (d) enforce our agreements with third parties and business partners; and (iv) in connection with a merger or other business transaction.
label: none

clause: (iii)You may request access or deletion of such order data through the following links: For Grubhub, click here.
label: none

clause: If we deny your request, you may appeal the denial by emailing privacy@grubhub.com.
label: none

clause: Updates to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
label: none

clause: When we make changes to this Privacy Policy, we will change the effective date at the beginning of this Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: In addition to posting the updated Privacy Policy and effective date, we may elect to provide additional notice to you of the updated Privacy Policy, such as by sending an email to you or providing a notice through the Platform and/or Services.
label: none

clause: All changes shall be effective from the date of publication unless otherwise provided.
label: none

clause: If you do not cancel your Account before the date the revised Privacy Policy becomes effective, your continued access to or use of the Platform and/or Services will be subject to the revised Privacy Policy.
label: none
